entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 01:54 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -25.8°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
